item.title: By: Curt Stone
item.dc:creator: Curt Stone
item.description: <p>I feel your pain. One night, I tried to meet my wife at Magic Kingdom. When I got off the bus, I noticed rain coming down. It was slow at first and quickly started to down pour with flashes of lightning. I saw people running out of the park and I thought this would be great if the rain stopped. Then, I see my wife and sister run past me in a panic just as I entered the park. I had my headphones on and I ripped them off my head. I thought I checked to make sure the little ear covers were it tact. When I returned to the room, a little wet, one was gone. That really annoyed me. These are Sony headphones and I've now lost all three pairs of ear covers. The next day, I bought the IBM headphones for $5.95. They sounded awful so I used the ear covers on my Sony and although they are black and the headphones white, they worked. A set of these babies are $10. The headphone challenge continues. <br />Nice chatting with you at Lotusphere!</p>
item.content:encoded:
I feel your pain. One night, I tried to meet my wife at Magic Kingdom. When I got off the bus, I noticed rain coming down. It was slow at first and quickly started to down pour with flashes of lightning. I saw people running out of the park and I thought this would be great if the rain stopped. Then, I see my wife and sister run past me in a panic just as I entered the park. I had my headphones on and I ripped them off my head. I thought I checked to make sure the little ear covers were it tact. When I returned to the room, a little wet, one was gone. That really annoyed me. These are Sony headphones and I’ve now lost all three pairs of ear covers. The next day, I bought the IBM headphones for $5.95. They sounded awful so I used the ear covers on my Sony and although they are black and the headphones white, they worked. A set of these babies are $10. The headphone challenge continues.
Nice chatting with you at Lotusphere!
